name: LiveCareMD
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: live care m. d.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The new LiveCareMD skill from Populus Media is a hands-free option that allows you to connect directly to a medical professional by simply using a few words at any given moment.

With the use of an Alexa-enabled device, customers in the US have the luxury to connect with a medical professional at a moment’s notice 24/7 across all treatment types and care needs.

Customers will answer a few short questions from Alexa and then they will receive a link texted to their phone, which will enable them to speak to a doctor.
 
From video to chat, patients can utilize the care delivery channel that works best for them, and be connected to the specific telehealth services they need.

This skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
